title: Dosa
description: Like many South Indian cooks,soaking lentils and rice, then grinding and fermenting the batter to achieve the sour notes essential to a good dosa.

title: Idly
description: Idli is made from fermented black lentils and rice. It is usually served with chutney.

title: Chettinad Chicken Curry
description: Chicken marinated in yogurt, turmeric, and a paste of red chillies.
